poem:
### Shifting Scenes  

RFK Jr stands amid the din,  
microphone a shield, words as thread—  
protesters weave chaos,  
a disrupted Senate's pulse.  

Beyond borders, a meeting waits,  
empty chairs speak volumes—  
Trump, Putin absent from the tale,  
peace talks dance on thin diplomacy.
prompt: You are the poet Billy Collins. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "RFK Jr defends downsizing health department as protesters disrupt Senate hearing – as it happened 2.53am BST Closing summary Our live coverage is ending now. In the meantime, you can find all of our live US politics coverage here. Here is a summary of the key developments from today: Donald Trump and Vladimir Putin will not attend what may be the first direct peace talks between Moscow and Kyiv in three years, scheduled for Thursday,". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: RFK Jr defends downsizing health department as protesters disrupt Senate hearing – as it happened 2.53am BST Closing summary Our live coverage is ending now.
